mapper.select:
/*正式评审审批*/
select dat.*, dat.businessid as business_id, lg.taskmark, (select o.NAME from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = dat.pertainareaid) pertainareaName, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.uuid = dat.createby) investManagerName, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.uuid = dat.reviewpersonid) reviewLeaderName, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.uuid = dat.legalreviewpersonid) investlegalReviewLeaderName from RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_INFO dat join RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_LOG lg on dat.BUSINESSID = lg.BUSINESSID and lg.audituserid = '${userId}' and lg.iswaiting = '1' join act_ru_task ac on ac.id_ = lg.taskid and ac.execution_id_ = lg.executionid /*and ac.assignee_ = lg.lastuserid*/
and dat.pertainareaName like '%${projectUnitName}%'
and dat.projectName like '%${projectName}%'
order by dat.apply_date desc
/*投标评审审批*/
select dat.*, dat.businessid as business_id, (select o.NAME from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = dat.pertainareaid) pertainareaName, (select o.NAME from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = dat.reportingunit_id) reportingunitName, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.uuid = dat.createby) investManagerName, (select u.name from sys_user u where u.uuid = dat.reviewpersonid) reviewLeaderName from rcm_pre_info dat join rcm_pre_log lg on dat.businessid = lg.businessid and lg.audituserid = '${userId}' and lg.iswaiting = '1' join act_ru_task ac on ac.id_ = lg.taskid and ac.execution_id_ = lg.executionid
and dat.pertainareaName like '%${projectUnitName}%'
and dat.projectName like '%${projectName}%'
order by dat.apply_date desc
/*其它评审审批*/

if.test: key != null and key != '' and key == 'formalReview'

select.if: select tmp.* from ( select t.*, (select i.project_name from rcm_project_info i where i.business_id = t.businessid) bulletinname, (select name from sys_user where uuid = t.audituserid) auditusername, row_number () over (partition by (t.taskdesc) order by t.orderby desc) idx from rcm_formalassessment_log t where t.businessid = #{business_id} order by iswaiting asc, orderby asc ) tmp where tmp.idx = 1
